body: Shoulda picked the Saber route, Shirou
They aren't the same people, "gramps" is Emiya Kiritsugu, and the second guy is Emiya Shirou, the adopted son of Emiya Kiritsugu. Regardless, girls got a thing for tortured souls it seems.

Is it really stealing if you steal it from yourself...?

Well, Simon Petrikov would know. Cough, cough.
both of them are not same people! it look like emiya was NTR!!!
